query: SELECT id, subjectId, version, SUBSTRING(content, 1, 200) as content_start, SUBSTRING(content, -200) as content_end, LENGTH(content) as content_length FROM frameworks WHERE subjectId = (SELECT id FROM subjects WHERE code = 'economia_politica') LIMIT 1;
